actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A resolution to pay tribute to Frances G. Knight on the occasion of her retirement from Federal service.

summary.text: Declares the sense of the House of Representatives that Frances G. Knight be commended for her outstanding service to the Nation upon the occasion of her retirement from Federal service.

titles.title: A resolution to pay tribute to Frances G. Knight on the occasion of her retirement from Federal service.
